FuncDef: This command creates VRRP control policies. The VRRP policy ID must be created by the policy command prior to association with the virtual router instance.

ParaDef.Info: The vrrp-policy-id parameter associated the corresponding VRRP priority control policy-id with the virtual router instance. The vrrp-policy-id must already exist in the system for the policy command to be successful. Values-1 to 9999.
